resources.string: Smaller event: urine, faeces, wind, dew, and sleep.
The biggest event: the exit of the manna and the confluence of male circumcision, circumcision of the woman, menstruation or puerperium.
The intention is wudoo "(and the intention is in the heart and there is no need to pronounce it) called "Bismillah" and wash your hands three times
The water enters your hand in your mouth and the water moves inside the mouth and then you do it three times
The water enters your nose in your right hand and scatters it with your left hand
Wash your face three times and wash the face from the top of the front down the chin lengthwise and from ear to ear casually
Wash the right hand into the attachment three times and wash the left hand into the elbow three times as well
Moisten your hand and then wipe them on your head from the front and back with your hand forward, do it once and you can just wipe a part of the head
Wipe the ears with the same water that is taken from the head, and the scan is one time and can be connected with the head scan
The right man is washed three times and then the left. The two men wash the water to the ankles, which are the two bones on the sides of the foot.

Wash your hands with your left hand, then wash your hands again and wade. Then empty the water on your head three times and make sure that the water reaches the hair shaft. Then wash the rest of your body starting with the right side and then the left With a note of delivery of water to all parts of the body and conclude the washing by washing the feet.
